content:
This article lead me to believe, no: https://articles.bchlr.de/traits-dynamic-dispatch-upcasting

But, this initiative seems to suggest something was merged in July 2021 that might allow a form of dyn upcasting: https://rust-lang.github.io/dyn-upcasting-coercion-initiative/design-discussions/

Or am I misunderstanding?
Define "dynamic upcasting" because I'd say that it exists today, but that depends on what you take it to mean.
I've determined that there are multiple ways to achieve dynamic upcasting and like you're mentioning here, my issue was scope/specificity, I'll mark this as resolved
